Articles.Content:
Two shuttles I made NASA style (no engine on middle tank, no excessive amount of rcs (the bigger craft doesn't even have rcs (well it does for docking)). The smaller one is stock (ramirez) and the bigger one uses the mk 4 spaceplane system mod.

Easy money easy life, just throtle up and launch. You can use actiongroup 2 for the bigger craft to make it more stable during launch and before you eject the boosters (way before).

I successfully managed to put 4.5 tons in orbit with the stock craft and about 16 tons with the bigger one.

Smaller one uses rcs engines for orbital manouvers, the bigger one normal engines

http://www.megafileupload.com/en/file/585603/VAB-rar.html

if you need help with shuttles I will gladly help.

Have fun!

Edited December 6, 2014 by calin petrescu

neat, I love stock shuttles!
